about_the_game:
A theme befitting of a ninja assassin! The tenth track of the Capcom Arcade Stadium: Mini-Album is none other than "Strider - Theme"!

This iconic anthem plays in the first stage of Strider, one of the titles included in Capcom Arcade Stadium!

Don't miss out on some nostalgic favorites!
